DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
--- Actualizar Zona Amba update D_LOCALIDADES set Id_Zona_Amba = 1 where id_provincia = 'C' and Id_Zona_Amba <> 1
update D_LOCALIDADES set Id_Zona_Amba = S.[ZNP_COD] from D_LOCALIDADES L join SOPORTE1.[Soporte1].[dbo].[PRW015] S on (L.id_localidad = S.[ZNP_CPD]) where L.id_provincia <> 'C' and S.[ZNP_COD] in (2,4,5)
update D_LOCALIDADES set Id_Zona_Amba = 99 where Id_Zona_Amba not in (1, 2, 4, 5)

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1
Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server v9; © 2004 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualizo la información existente */ UPDATE d_localidades SET de_localidad = a12.de_localidad, id_posicion = a12.id_posicion, id_provincia = a12.id_provincia, id_zona_comercial = a12.id_zona_comercial, id_departamento = a12.id_departamento, id_Auditoria_Internacion = a12.id_Auditoria_Internacion FROM D_localidades D inner join AUX_D_LOCALIDADES a12 ON D.id_localidad = a12.id_localidad
/* Creo la información faltante */ INSERT INTO d_localidades ( id_localidad, de_localidad, id_posicion, id_provincia, id_grupo_localidad ,id_zona_comercial,id_departamento, id_Zona_Amba , De_Barrio_Amba, id_Auditoria_Internacion , id_audired, id_subzona_comercial) SELECT DISTINCT id_localidad, de_localidad, id_posicion, id_provincia, '' as id_grupo_localidad ,id_zona_comercial,id_departamento, 99 as id_Zona_Amba ,'' as De_Barrio_Amba, id_Auditoria_Internacion , 0 as id_audired, 0 as id_subzona_comercial FROM AUX_D_LOCALIDADES a11 WHERE a11.id_localidad not in (SELECT distinct id_localidad FROM d_localidades)
----- Actualiza AUDIRED
--PONE TODO EN 0 POR SI HAY BAJAS DE LOCALIDADES AUDITADAS POR AUDIRED UPDATE D_LOCALIDADES SET id_audired = 0
--ACTUALIZA EN 1 PARA TODAS LAS LOCALIDADES QUE APARECEN EN P03FATL UPDATE D_LOCALIDADES SET id_audired = 1 WHERE id_localidad IN (select WL3COD from HOST03.HOST03.SMPORDD.P03FATL)
------- Actualiza id_subzona_comercial e id_zona_comercial
--- consulta que actualiza id_subzona_comercial de los datos de txt locali update D_LOCALIDADES set id_subzona_comercial = as400.id_subzona_comercial from [HOST03].[HOST03].[ASOCIADOS].[LOCALIDADES_SUBZONAS] as400 Inner join D_LOCALIDADES d ON d.id_localidad = as400.id_localidad
--- consulta que actualiza id_zona_comercial de los datos de txt locali update D_LOCALIDADES set id_zona_comercial = as400.id_zona_comercial from [HOST03].[HOST03].[ASOCIADOS].[SUBZONA_COMERCIAL] as400 Inner join D_LOCALIDADES d ON d.id_subzona_comercial = as400.id_subzona_comercial

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server v9; © 2004 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
------ Borra la AUX_D_LOCALIDADES
Truncate Table AUX_D_LOCALIDADES

DTS:Executable.DTS:Description: Pasaje de txt a tabla SQL

component.contactInfo: OLE DB Destination;Microsoft Corporation;Microsoft SqlServer v9; (C) 2005 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;4
component.name: OLE DB Destination

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection
